snippet.title: Thea: The Awakening - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Thea: The Awakening is a turned-based strategic survival game inspired by the Slavic mythology and set in a procedural dark fantasy world infused with non-linear story and unique combat system.

Thea: The Awakening is out on 20th November 2015!

Grab your copy on:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/378720
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/thea_theawakening_storefront
Greenman Gaming: http://www.greenmangaming.com/s/gb/en/pc/games/strategy/thea-awakening/
